com.vmware.vapi.security

Class UserPassSecurityContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.vapi.security.UserPassSecurityContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionContext.SecurityContext

    public final class UserPassSecurityContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExecutionContext.SecurityContext
    This class represents a security context suitable for user/password authentication.
